metadata.description: The Return of Randy Queen's Darkchylde! A new armor for Jackie Estacado, the bearer of The Darkness. A new beginning for Ariel, the Darkchylde. A new threat for the world. This Christmas, things will get dark, when The Darkness and Darkchylde must enter the Kingdom of Pain. Guest starring Witchblade! Also includes a bonus 8 page never-before-seen preview of Starfall, the highly anticipated sci-fi horror title from Randy and Sarah Queen!
metadata.name: The Darkness/Darkchylde
